definitions.definition: One who, or that which, consumes .
Someone who trades money for goods or services as an individual.
examples: This new system favours the consumer over the producer.

definitions.definition: The consumer base of a product, service or business.
examples: Our consumers are upwardly mobile and middle-class.

definitions.definition: An organism ( heterotroph ) that uses other organisms for food in order to gain energy .

main_definition: One who, or that which, consumes .
secondary_definitions: ( economics ) Someone who trades money for goods or services as an individual.
( by extension ) The consumer base of a product, service or business.
( ecology ) An organism ( heterotroph ) that uses other organisms for food in order to gain energy .
